info.description: This is the swagger.json for the macooa REST API. at [https://www.macooa.com/restapi/v1]
info.title: Swagger macooa

tags.name: contact
tags.description: Operations executed on contacts who are assigned to organisations

tags.name: address
tags.description: Operations executed on person or organisation addresses

tags.name: contactdata
tags.description: Operations executed on contactdata for persons or contacts

post.summary: create a new person for given tenant
post.description: create a new person for given tenant

requestBody.description: person object that needs to be created
person object that needs to be updated

post.summary: create a new organisation for given tenant
post.description: create a new organisation for given tenant

requestBody.description: organisation object that needs to be created
organisation object that needs to be updated

post.summary: create a new contact assigned to an organisation
post.description: create a contact assigned to an organisation

requestBody.description: contact object that needs to be created
contact object that needs to be updated

post.summary: create a new address assigned to an organisation or person
post.description: create a contact assigned to an organisation or person

requestBody.description: address object that needs to be created
address object that needs to be updated

post.summary: create new contactdata assigned to a contact or person
post.description: create a contactdata assigned to a contact or person

requestBody.description: contactdata object that needs to be created
contactdata object that needs to be updated
